0.name: Noisy Mouse
0.text: (Have you noticed that you can enter some buildings while some you cannot?

1.name: Noisy Mouse
1.text: As a house entering professional, I can say that doors that are [color]round[/color] or have a sign can be entered.

2.name: Noisy Mouse
2.text: [color]Rectangular doors[/color], on the other hand, [color]will not open[/color] no matter what.

3.name: Noisy Mouse
3.text: Although, if you try knocking on some of those doors, you might get an answer.)
